project: MK Language Lab – UI Overhaul & POC Feature Implementation

tasks.title: Create global design tokens & dark theme variables
tasks.description: Set up all color, spacing, typography, and gradient variables for the new dark theme. Provide both a JSON definition file and CSS variables. Theme must support a black UI similar to ChatGPT, white text, and a TikTok-style pink gradient for 'македонски'.
deliverables: globals.css or theme.css with CSS variables
Gradient class for title (TikTok-style pink → magenta → purple)
acceptance_criteria: All tokens defined in JSON and CSS.
Tokens include colors, gradients, font sizes, spacing, radii, transitions.
Other agents can import and use the theme.
Visual sample in README or PR body.

tasks.title: Implement UI Shell: header, македонски gradient title, sidebar, layout foundation
tasks.description: Create the global layout shell: top header, left sidebar navigation, responsive layout, and base styling. Add the gradient Cyrillic title 'македонски'. Sidebar should include icons for Translate, Quick Practice, and Resources. Build minimal, modern layout similar to ChatGPT.

tasks.title: Rebuild Translator UI & logic with skeletons, streaming, and local history
tasks.description: Create a new modern translator component: main textarea, instant submit, skeleton loader, and streaming result output. Store history locally in IndexedDB/localStorage. Implement optimistic save and toggleable history panel.
acceptance_criteria: Translate button responds instantly with skeleton.
Streaming text output works without lag.

tasks.title: Build new Quick Practice flashcard system
tasks.description: Create minimal, fast flashcard UI: Macedonian → reveal → next/prev, plus keyboard controls. Cards use translation history or a small curated deck. Design should feel clean and focused.
deliverables: Keyboard shortcuts: space to reveal, arrows to navigate
acceptance_criteria: History deck loads if translations exist
Visually consistent with new dark theme

tasks.title: Create Resources page & optional right-side panel
tasks.description: Create a curated list of Macedonian learning resources. Layout is minimal and uses card/List UI. Content should lazy-load and be searchable.
deliverables: Minimal list of recommended learning links
acceptance_criteria: No placeholder or long descriptive blocks

tasks.title: Performance optimization & loading state overhaul
tasks.description: Add skeleton loaders everywhere needed. Split bundles using route-level lazy components. Remove unused imports, add local caching, and ensure instant tap responsiveness.
acceptance_criteria: Button clicks respond instantly with UI feedback

tasks.title: Add accessibility & end-to-end test coverage
tasks.description: Add Playwright tests for core user flows. Implement axe-core checks and fix major issues. Create a PR checklist.
acceptance_criteria: Core flows tested: Translate, Quick Practice, Resources

tasks.title: Remove unused pages, placeholder text, and deprecated features
tasks.description: Delete all old dashboard pages, streaks, mission control, coach tips, placeholder gating text, and anything not part of Translate / Practice / Resources.
acceptance_criteria: No pages or sections remain except: Translate, Practice, Resources

tasks.title: Apply dark theme to all core components
tasks.description: Create a modern minimal component system using the design tokens. Update buttons, inputs, textareas, cards, and panels to match the dark theme aesthetic.
acceptance_criteria: All UI feels cohesive, modern, and minimal
No component uses ad-hoc inline colors

tasks.title: Set up CI/CD pipelines, PR previews, and performance budgets
tasks.description: Set up GitHub Actions (or Vercel CI) that run build, lint, tests, and deploy preview branches. Add a bundle-size threshold so PRs fail if too large.
acceptance_criteria: Every PR generates a preview URL
